Html:
Hi,
i cached the 2 map type which are google map and google hybrid
when i change the MapProvider to google map or google hybrid for the first time it takes so much time
for example in application when i change the map it takes 1 minute to change the MapProvider to google hybrid
why it just takes time for the first time and is there any solution to solve this?
thanks

radioman wrote:
use release build
I "ALWAYS" use release build
also, i tested demo winform exe file
it takes times to change the mapprovider

radioman wrote:
do you work offline?
i cached the maps but i use the gmap this way

if (!isInternetConnectionAvailable)
{
gMapControl1.Manager.Mode = AccessMode.CacheOnly;
}
else
{
gMapControl1.Manager.Mode = AccessMode.ServerAndCache;
}

and isInternetConnectionAvailable is always true because PC is connected to internet!
try debug google provider and find out where is the problem
